properties.name: gamerule.default-initial-chip
properties.description: How much chips a new or bankrupt player will acquire.

properties.name: gamerule.default-small-blind-bet
properties.description: How much the small blind player bet when game start.

properties.name: api.error-redirect
properties.description: Where to redirect when /error be accessed.

properties.name: api.websocket-endpoint
properties.description: Where to access websocket, empty to use base-url, this config is used to bypass CDN.
